abstract: Iran clarifies earlier statements claiming United States is unjustly detaining 19 Iranian citizens on sanctions violations; assertion comes as US presses Iran for release of Washington Post Tehran correspondent Jason Rezaian along with two or possibly three other detained Americans.
lead_paragraph: The request came as the United States is pressing Iran to release three American citizens — including a Washington Post correspondent — and provide information about a fourth missing for eight years.

headline.main: Tehran Claims U.S. Is Holding 19 Iranians
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Iran: 19 Detained by U.S., Tehran Says

snippet: The request came as the United States is pressing Iran to release three American citizens — including a Washington Post correspondent — and provide information about a fourth missing for eight years.
